name: Children's Ministry
description: Nurturing the faith of our youngest members through age-appropriate Bible lessons, activities, and fellowship.

name: Youth Ministry
description: Equipping teens to grow in their faith through Bible study, mentorship, and community service.

name: Worship Team
description: Leading our congregation in worship through music, song, and creative arts each Sunday.

name: Food Pantry
description: Serving our neighbors in need by collecting and distributing food to families in the Riverview community.

name: Men's Ministry
description: Building brotherhood through Bible study, service projects, and fellowship events for men of all ages.

name: Women's Ministry
description: Encouraging and equipping women through Bible study, mentoring, and fellowship gatherings.

name: Missions Committee
description: Coordinating local and global mission efforts to spread the Gospel and serve communities in need.

name: Welcome Team
description: Creating a warm and inviting atmosphere for all who walk through our doors on Sunday mornings.

name: Deacons
description: Serving the practical and spiritual needs of our congregation through care, support, and stewardship.

name: Elders
description: Providing spiritual oversight, teaching, and pastoral care for the congregation.

name: Nursery
description: Providing loving, safe care for infants and toddlers during Sunday worship services.

name: Sunday School
description: Teaching the Bible to all ages through structured classes held before the Sunday worship service.
